word: God calls upon Doctor_____to come near to Him by faith and obedience. The grace of God can subdue, sanctify, and refine, and make him an honor to the cause and a chosen vessel fit for the Master's use. The natural heart may be transformed by the grace of God.--Manuscript 1, 1880, pp. 1-3, 12-14. ("Church Difficulties," February 18, 1880.)
